title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, September 17, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of Ken Kesey (1935), author of “One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest,” a novel based on his experiences working in a veterans hospital.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
